channel.title: Usher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Usher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Usher On Taking On Frank Sinatra in New Ralph Lauren Fragrance Campaign, His Workout and Rest Routines
item.description: With his global tour heading down under, the busy R&B star shares how he’s shifting his mindset as he gets older: “I’m slowly beginning to understand, you need to rest.”
